searchText: chicken tikka masala 800 g boneless chicken thighs (skinless, cut into bite-sized pieces) 250 ml plain yogurt 16 g minced garlic 10 g fresh, crushed or minced ginger 5 g garam masala 2 g turmeric 2 g ground cumin 5 g kashmiri chili (or 2.5 g ground red chili powder) 6 g salt 40 ml vegetable oil (or canola oil) 40 g butter 2 small onions (or 1 large onion, finely diced) 16 g finely grated garlic 10 g finely grated ginger 4 g garam masala 3 g ground cumin 2 g turmeric powder 2 g ground coriander 400 g tomato puree (tomato sauce/passata) 5 g kashmiri chili (optional for color and flavor) 2 g red chili powder (adjust to your taste preference) 6 g salt 315 ml heavy or thickened cream (use evaporated milk for lower calories) 4 g brown sugar 65 ml water (if needed) 2 g fresh coriander (to garnish) combine chicken with all marinade ingredients in a bowl. marinate for 10 minutes to an hour (or overnight). heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. sear chicken in batches for 3 minutes per side until browned. set aside and keep warm. melt butter in the same pan. sauté onions until soft (about 3 minutes), scraping up browned bits. add garlic, ginger, and spices; fry for 20 seconds. pour in tomato puree, chili powders, and salt. simmer for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce thickens and deepens in color. stir cream and sugar into the sauce. add chicken and its juices back to the pan. cook for 8-10 minutes until chicken is cooked through and sauce is thick. add water if needed to thin. garnish with fresh coriander. serve hot with garlic verdickte sahne, für weniger kalorien kondensmilch verwenden) 4 g brauner zucker 65 ml wasser (falls benötigt) 2 g frischer koriander (zum garnieren) hähnchen mit allen marinadezutaten in einer schüssel vermengen. mindestens 10 minuten bis eine stunde (oder über nacht) marinieren lassen. öl in einer großen pfanne bei mittlerer bis hoher hitze erhitzen. hähnchenstücke portionsweise braten, nicht überfüllen. auf jeder seite 3 minuten goldbraun braten. beiseite stellen und warm halten. butter in derselben pfanne schmelzen. gehackte zwiebeln weich (ca. 3 minuten) anbraten, dabei
